External C++ plugin¶

Plugin to convert USPTO bulk patent data (from 1976 - present) to CSV from TXT, XML1, and XML2 (original format types).

convert_funcs.txt_to_df(arg0: str, arg1: str, arg2: bool, arg3: bool) → int¶

Function that takes USPTO (1976-2001) data from txt file, extracts pertinent fields, and creates (or appends to) CSV output.

Parameters

  • input_file – string, path of ‘.txt’ file to read data from

  • output_file – string, path of ‘.csv’ file to store data

  • append – bool, open and writes to output_file in append mode if true

  • header – bool, prints header as first line to csv output_file if true

Returns

int – number of patents read from TXT file
